title: Dino Gnar costume!
body: My son was Dino Gnar for Halloween. I sewed the costume myself. Just through Id share it!  Oh, and I didnt put the footies on it, because he had to wear shoes for trick or treating.

replies.body: Awesome!
Thank you!  He didnt like to wear the hood, but was really happy once he realized what the concept of "trick or treating" was.

Haha! That's awesome. Someone at school today dressed up as Teemo, and won a prize for "Most Creative".
Anyway, Happy Halloween and such. What'd be even better, though, is if you were the Mega Gnar, Side by side comparison, and boom.{{champion:150}}

Oh neat! I bet that was a cute costume.


Having his dad be Mega Gnar was the original plan, but he had to work that night.    We do at some point plan to do Cho'gath costumes. a little one for kiddo and a big one for dad.
Just... TAKE MY MONEY AND GO!
For the child or the costume?
Yes
You are a great father :D
Thanks!  Im actually the mama, his dad is pretty good too though!  Last year we all went as Ash, Misty and Pikachu. I sewed the kiddo a Pikachu kigurumi, as well, but he's since grown out of it.
That is the most amazing thing to happen on Halloween I have ever heard.
this kid probably feeds
Yes. On candy, vegetables and french fries. D:
This really is awesome! As a gnar main who only uses the dino gnar skin I approve!
That you! I am glad!
Kids never wanna wear the hoods / hats. It's a shame.
Oh, I know. it really is.  And it was pouring rain, so his hair was all wet and I was worried he was going to get sick.
That is the cutest Dino Gnar{{champion:150}}  I have seen! What an awesome parent! :D
The picture would have been better if he was playing with alphabet blocks instead of a camera :P
He does have those! Yet I had to bribe him with an electronic in order to get him to stand still. :/
Now I'm jealous and I want one.
It was very easy to make, actually.  Though I found that kigurumis are even easier.
This is amazing. Kappa
Where did you get the cloth to sew this D:?

I just got it from a fabric store. Joanns or something.   The body suit was actually made out of an old Louise (Bobs Burgers) costume that I had before, and then some spares that I had for the purple.
Cute. Any plans to make a Voidling themed costume in the future by any chance?

I hadn't planned on it.   The only future costumes Ive thought of so far for my family at least, are 

Mega Gnar,  Giant Cho'gath

Little Cho'gath, possibly a minion

Mafia Jinx, Bandit Sivir
